allow: Bash(# 创建完整的图片目录结构 cd /e/trae/Custom\\ Wire\\ Harness/astro/public echo ""=== 创建图片目录结构 ==="" mkdir -p images/homepage mkdir -p images/factory mkdir -p images/products mkdir -p images/applications mkdir -p images/compatibility mkdir -p images/about mkdir -p images/services echo ""✅ 目录创建完成"" echo """" echo ""目录结构:"" tree -L 2 images || find images -type d)
